sprouts

Interface Event

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Observable

    public interface Event
extends Observable
    An event is something that can be observed as well as triggered, and it is used to inform a set of subscribers that something has happened. It allows for the registration of Observers which are invoked when the fire() method is called. Contrary to events received by property observers (see Action), observing an Event does not involve any state.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Event.Executor
      The "event executor" is responsible for executing a given Runnable when an Event is triggered.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Event create()
      Creates a new empty Event that can be observed and triggered.
      void fire()
      Triggers this Event, which means that all registered listeners will be notified.
      static Event of(Observer observer)
      Creates a new Event that can be observed and triggered.
      Event subscribe(Observer observer)
      Subscribes the given listener to this Event.
      void unsubscribeAll()
      Unsubscribes all listeners from this Event.
      static Event using(Event.Executor executor)
      Creates a new Event that can be observed, triggered and executed asynchronously on a custom event queue, thread pool or any other executor.

        unsubscribe

    • Method Detail

      • fire

        void fire()
        Triggers this Event, which means that all registered listeners will be notified.

      • subscribe

        Event subscribe(Observer observer)
        Subscribes the given listener to this Event.
        Specified by:
        subscribe in interface Observable
        Parameters:
        observer - The listener to subscribe.
        Returns:
        This Event, to allow for method chaining.

      • unsubscribeAll

        void unsubscribeAll()
        Unsubscribes all listeners from this Event.

      • of

        static Event of(Observer observer)
        Creates a new Event that can be observed and triggered.
        Parameters:
        observer - The first listener to subscribe to the new Event.
        Returns:
        A new Event.

      • create

        static Event create()
        Creates a new empty Event that can be observed and triggered.
        Returns:
        A new Event.

      • using

        static Event using(Event.Executor executor)
        Creates a new Event that can be observed, triggered and executed asynchronously on a custom event queue, thread pool or any other executor.
        Parameters:
        executor - A Consumer of Runnables that will be used to execute the fire() method.
        Returns:
        A new Event.
